summary: Completed comprehensive testing of M5 Forecast Pro demand forecasting application. Backend APIs work perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend has some loading state issues but core functionality works including model training, data exploration, and business impact calculator.

ui_bugs.issue: Dashboard page gets stuck in 'Loading dashboard...' state intermittently

integration_issues.issue: Model Comparison page loads but requires fresh training data to show comparison charts

passed_tests: All 7 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Dashboard loads with historical data and metrics
Data Exploration shows trends, seasonality, and anomalies correctly
Model Training successfully trains all 4 models (ARIMA, SARIMA, Prophet, LSTM)
Business Impact calculator works and shows detailed breakdown
AI insights generation works with GPT-5.2

success_percentage.frontend: 85% - Core functionality works with minor loading state issues

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix dashboard loading state issue where page occasionally gets stuck on 'Loading dashboard...' message. The API calls work perfectly, but there may be a state management issue in the React component that prevents the loading state from updating after successful API responses.
